SEARCH
Package main

Class HospitalApp

java.lang.Object
main.HospitalApp
public class HospitalApp extends Object
Main entry point for the hospital management application. This class handles user login and provides user-specific functionality based on their roles.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to start the hospital application. Continuously prompts for user login and redirects to user-specific functionality if login is successful.
      Parameters:
      args - the command-line arguments

    • handleUserInput

      public static void handleUserInput(User user)
      Handles user input and actions based on the user's role.
      Parameters:
      user - the logged-in user

    • handlePatientActions

      public static void handlePatientActions(Patient patient, int choice)
      Handles actions specific to patients.
      Parameters:
      patient - the logged-in patient
      choice - the option selected by the patient

    • handleDoctorActions

      public static void handleDoctorActions(Doctor doctor, int choice)
      Handles actions specific to doctors.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the logged-in doctor
      choice - the option selected by the doctor

    • handlePharmacistActions

      public static void handlePharmacistActions(Pharmacist pharmacist, int choice)
      Handles actions specific to pharmacists.
      Parameters:
      pharmacist - the logged-in pharmacist
      choice - the option selected by the pharmacist

    • handleAdminActions

      public static void handleAdminActions(Administrator admin, int choice, Scanner sc)
      Handles actions specific to administrators.
      Parameters:
      admin - the logged-in administrator
      choice - the option selected by the administrator
      sc - a Scanner object for user input
